import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; // useNavigate from react-router-dom import axios from 'axios'; const Login = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [rememberMe, setRememberMe] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(""); // State for error message const navigate = useNavigate(); // useNavigate hook for navigation const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await axios.post("http://localhost:5001/api/login", { email, password }); // Check if the response has the expected data structure if (response.data && response.data.user && response.data.user.id) { // On success, save user id to local storage and redirect to Menu localStorage.setItem('userId', response.data.user.id); navigate("/menu"); // Redirect to Menu.js page using navigate } else { setError("Unexpected response format from server."); } } catch (err) { // Check if the error is from the server (response error) if (err.response) { setError("Invalid email or password."); } else if (err.request) { // Network error or no response setError("Server not responding, please try again later."); } else { // Something else went wrong setError("An error occurred, please try again."); } } }; return (

Enjoy a hassle-free login process to easily make reservations and access your exclusive dining experience at Little Lemon Restaurant. Let us serve you with the finest flavors.

); }; export default Login;
